sentences.sentence: Btw, mascaras is not environmental friendly products …
sentences.translation: 再说， 睫毛膏不是很环保的产品…

sentences.sentence: It also comes off very easily with make up remover which is fantastic because not all mascaras are like that.
sentences.translation: 它用卸妆水就能卸除的很干净，这个是非常好的，因为很多睫毛膏也做不到。

sentences.sentence: This original bi-phased eye makeup removing lotion immediately removes all mascara types, even waterproof mascaras in one swift action.
sentences.translation: 原来这双眼睛的化妆分阶段取消洗剂立即删除所有类型睫毛膏，防水柔皙紧致甚至在一个迅速采取行动。
